mapper.insert: insert into r_user (uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, user_name, user_nickname, mobile, wechat, email, password, open_id, other) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, user_name, user_nickname, mobile, wechat, email, password, open_id, other from r_user
